name: Abey Gates
overview:
Whether the requirement is for a fully automatic gate, cantilever or sliding gate, an automatic swinging gate, electric gates, or just a basic manually-operated gate in Glasgow and it’s surrounding areas, Abbey Gates are the number one! Metal Gates and Railings

If you are looking for gates and railings with excellent design, manufacturing, workmanship and service, Abbeygates is the company you are looking for. We can provide your home or business with secure and reliable gates and railings. Steel Fabrication and Welding

We provide steel and metal fabrication services to domestic and commercial businesses across a range of sectors. Our expert staff provide tailored, precision services that suit every need for every solution. We can literally make any metal structure! Bespoke Metal Work and Sculptures

Our team at Abbeygates have a passion for metal sculpturing and we can work together with you to create and perfect your own designs and ideas. Your ideas could be anything from garden sculptures, chairs, ornaments and gifts.
